meanings.sent1: The new technology enabled us to communicate instantly.
meanings.sent2: Having a map enabled us to find our way through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand enabled the wizard to fly around the castle.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude enabled her to overcome any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is often enabled by hard work and determination.

meanings.definition: To give someone the authority or means to do something
meanings.sent1: The manager enabled the team to make important decisions.
meanings.sent2: Being a mentor enabled her to guide others in their career paths.
meanings.sent3: The superhero enabled the citizens to feel safe and protected.
meanings.sent4: Education enables individuals to pursue their dreams and aspirations.
meanings.sent5: Kindness and support from friends can enable someone to face challenges with courage.
